phrases: He had an anemia attack, but he did not faint.
Being stuck with a syringe did not wake him up.
It is hard to tell when he actually sleeps.
I thought he was fine without sleep.
He was doing all the cooking, too.
You know that is not true.
I caused him much more concern.
All of us can think of something we did.
I do not know what to do in times like these.
You do not need to do anything.
We should run practice ourselves tomorrow, right?
Come to think of it, clerical procedures like registering for meets
We should at least take turns cooking.
All I can cook is ochazuke, though.
I have only ever boiled pasta.
Quit the team if you cannot run fast enough?
This is no time to be saying that.
I am not the one who suggested it.
I was just expressing my misgivings.
If that is what you hurled at me, then you are being a nuisance.
Earlier, you said you made him worry.
You are making him worry, are not you?
Do not ruin what Haiji entrusted to you.
You make it sound like he is dead!
You guys sure you do not actually get along?
That is not good enough, Prince.
I cannot even be a substitute captain.
We never decided who would do it.
I believe that, as the eldest and most experienced,
you are the most suitable candidate.
I cannot afford to look after others.
You mean you do not know about but I refuse?
Just so you know, I still do not think we can make it to Hakone.
I would not know how to lead the team.
After participating in all these practices?
If you go in order, I am next.
There is no way you would want to do it.
I still want to be asked.
Give me the chance to act like your senior.
I cannot respect him, at all.
I am sorry for always relying on you for everything!
This African mask will protect you from evil!
They said eating meat when you are sick is good for you King
I will lend you some of my comics.
You do not have to do this.
You do not have to do what Haiji does.
If I leave you alone, you will fall farther and farther behind.
Their efforts will be ruined because of you.
Buck up and take this seriously.
Since when have you been fast?
After all, you are a prodigy.
Then try talking at my speed.
Why did you start reading comics as soon as we got home?
I need to read the magazine that came out today by the end of the day.
Your comics are not going anywhere.
I heard Haiji collapsed, so I brought you something.
Maybe it was not to their tastes.
Whenever I cook at home, everyone says it is good.
My dad cries every time he eats it.
He must be better after a full day of rest.
there was a window in his room!
In other words, Haiji opened the window and used it to get outside.
His room's on the first floor.
We were stupid to let them handle it.
He finished the ochazuke we left in his room this morning.
So, he is well enough to eat and escape through a window?
You did not need to come all the way here.
I came to thank him for yesterday.
There is no beating Prince when it comes to sophistry.
Try talking at my speed, huh?
I got a proper look for the first time today, but he has no form at all.
You got a proper look for the first time, huh?
But I think he was watching you and waiting to see when you would look his way.
Prince is not the only one.
Everyone else is running behind you.
Until you turn around, you will never see them from where you are.
You will not see who is running where and how.
I have only had ochazuke to eat today.
I think I might get even more sick.
We can finally eat a decent meal.
Sorry for making you guys worry.
She even brought her own ingredients.
I would better thank her later.
I said, could you lend me some comics you recommend?
No, II do not have anything in my room.
I thought once in a while...
You are really good at that.
It is pretty hard to keep it steady.
You are making fun of me, are not you?
You are going to run like that?
I just want to try it for a bit.
Then, I will lead the way.
Normally, you look down when you read comics.
But when you are on the treadmill,
you naturally look forwards since your comics are in front of you.
You stand up straighter than you do when you are just running.
It brings your center of gravity forwards.
Then could you turn the pages, too?
And could I try something else?
With my bangs out of my face, I can see what is in front of me a lot better.
What have you been looking at until now?
Try imagining a comic in front of you as you run.
There is a lot I would like to say about that.
I bet it would be fun if you put bells in his hands.
It is like when he is reading comics!
Prince's arms are fixed in a reading position even when he is running.
Now that I think about it, I am amazed he could run like that.
Since we are not short-distance runners,
there is no need for sweeping arm movements.
But I would like to fix his habit of holding them in place.
Hey, it is starting to look right.
I cannot wait to go back to my room and read!
I cannot wait to go back to my room and read.
You have got your color back.
I do not want to make you worry unnecessarily.
You do not miss a thing.
Did you stay out of it because you knew this would happen?
I intended to fix things if I had to.
But I did not think it would ever really be his if he would learned to run that way.
It is truly a fortunate error.
I wish I could go back to my room and read!
I wish I could go back to my room and read!
He was going to get a good time, too!
Do not make such a fuss.
I still have a long way to go.
What is so great about that?
